	Health care system is to provide the browser to get appointments from a doctor through internet instead of going there and fixing an appointment. In Doctor’s side they can view their appointments and prescribe medicine for their patients.

SUMMARY
· Having 4.5+ years of professional software development experience in the areas of Microsoft Business Intelligence (MSBI) and expertise in Data Warehousing (DW) applications primarily using Microsoft SQL Server 2012/2014 stack.
· Equal competence in Integration Services, Reporting Services and Analysis Services.
· Hands on experience in Extract, Transform & Load (ETL) development using SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS).
· Hands on experience in SQL Server Reporting Service (SSRS).
· Hands on experience in scheduling and deploying reports on report manger.
· Having knowledge in Dimensional Data Modeling, Cube development and manipulations in SQL Server Analysis Services (SSAS).
· Hands on experience in creating Jobs, Alerts, SQL Mail Agent, Database Mail and scheduled DTS and SSIS Packages.
· Thorough Knowledge on Data Warehouse concepts like Star Schema, Snow Flake, Dimension and Fact Tables.
· 2+ years of experience in developing applications using Microsoft .NET technologies like SSDT for Visual Studio 2013, C#, MVC 4.0/5.0, Visual Studio 2012/2015, .Net framework 4.0/ 4.5, MS SQL Server 2012/2014, IIS 7.0 with active involvement in all the phases of SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT LIFE CYCLE (SDLC) including Requirement Gathering, Analysis, Design, Development, Testing, Customization, Implementation, Support and Maintenance.
· Expertise in C#, MVC 4.0/5.0, SQL Server, JavaScript, HTML, ADO.NET, CSS, Azure Portal Management.
· Very good experience on OOPs concepts.
· Good experience in creating Index, Views and Stored Procedures.
· Extensive knowledge in customizing and enhancing based on client’s requirement.

· Excellent team player with good communication, leadership skills, excellent analytical, inter-personal and written skills.
· Ability to adjust in new environments with a drive for results through self-motivation.
· Working on Windows Azure, SQL Azure, Online TFS and JIRA.

· Document technical specification document for each new feature.
· Coordinating with other team members.

Projects:-   1. BI – Implementation 
   
· Specialize in BI Data warehouse implementation & operation.

· Working knowledge Telecom Network elements and source systems.
· Translate customer requirements into formal requirements and design documents, establish specific solutions, and leading the efforts including programming and testing that culminate in client acceptance of the results.

    Responsibilities:- 
                
· Developed the DataStage jobs for integrating the files into Oracle database.
· Prepared the shell scripts to manage the source files and moved to DataStage input location.
· Prepared the Job sequences for running the jobs sequentially, and scheduled in the DS jobs in the Job Scheduling Console Tool (Tivoli).
· Prepared the DDL for creating the table from test to production database get it implemented through raising the RFC in remedy tool.
· File level testing on Unix platform.
· Data loading jobs monitoring through DataStag tool.
· Ensuring accuracy and timeliness in data loading and cognos report generating. Coordinating with circle-IT and Intelligence Network Teams Making Reconciliation scripts for daily activities.


         2. IRIS (Improved Revenue through Intelligence Segmentation)

· When call rate is very low & approximately consistent for all type of calls, Revenue increment is one of the major challenges for every telecom. To overcome this problem we designed IRIS (Improve Revenue with Intelligence Segmentation) application. Through subscriber CDR (Call Details Record) behaviour we analyse& fire test promo accordingly. Tracking of their promo related revenue, we compare before & after ROI (Revenue On-Investment) & identify whether this promo is beneficial or not & then after we launch that promo broadly.
